item.title: 据说大冢制药正在考虑出售医疗器械制造商 MicroPort Scientific 的股份
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，大冢控股株式会社正在考虑其在香港上市的 MicroPort Scientific Corp.【原文：Otsuka Holdings Co. is considering options for its holding in Hong Kong-listed MicroPort Scientific Corp., including selling its stake in the medical device maker, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织评估审计发现萨勒政权未报告债务后对塞内加尔的影响
item.description: 国际货币基金组织正在评估塞内加尔预算数据修订的影响，修订后的数据显示，这个西非国家的公共债务和财政赤字均高于此前的报告。【原文：The International Monetary Fund is assessing the impact of revisions to Senegalese budget data that showed the West African country’s public debt and fiscal deficit were higher than previously reported.】

item.title: 纳吉称第三季度匈牙利经济增长乏力
item.description: 匈牙利经济部长马尔通-纳吉（Marton Nagy）警告说，匈牙利第三季度的年度经济增长将接近于零。【原文：Hungary’s annual economic growth will be close to zero in the third quarter, Economy Minister Marton Nagy warned, in the latest sign that the country’s downturn is deeper than previously thought.】

item.title: 泰国证券交易所总裁称泰国降息预示股市将反弹
item.description: 泰国中央银行意外降息可能会在第四季度为该国股市提供进一步的动力，当地交易所负责人说。【原文：The Thai central bank’s surprise rate cut is likely to provide further momentum to the country’s equity market in the fourth quarter, the local exchange’s chief said.】

item.title: 欧洲央行预期降息前欧洲股市变动不大
item.description: 随着财报季的到来，欧洲股市变化不大，今天晚些时候投资者将注意力转向欧洲央行的利率决定，一致预期欧洲央行将连续第二次降息。【原文：European stocks traded little changed as earnings season rolls on, with investors turning their attention later today to the European Central Bank interest rates decision amid a consensus expectation that a second straight cut will be delivered.】

item.title: 自动驾驶初创公司 Pony.ai 据称计划本周公开申请美国 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，自动驾驶初创公司 Pony.ai 计划最快于本周在美国公开申请首次公开募股。【原文：Autonomous driving startup Pony.ai plans to file publicly for an initial public offering in the US as soon as this week, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 阿曼能源公司首次公开募股融资 20 亿美元，创历史新高
item.description: 阿曼国家能源公司首次公开发行其勘探和生产业务，募集资金超过 20 亿美元，这是阿曼苏丹国有史以来规模最大的一次上市。【原文：Oman’s state energy company raised a shade over $2 billion from the initial public offering of its exploration and production business, marking the sultanate’s biggest ever listing.】

item.title: 中国需求减少，瑞士钟表出口骤降
item.description: 由于对中国的出货量减少了一半，瑞士手表出口在 9 月份急剧下降，给这个欧洲国家苦苦挣扎的奢侈品行业带来了更大的压力。【原文：Swiss watch exports fell sharply in September as shipments to China dropped by half, putting more pressure on the European country’s struggling luxury sector.】

item.title: 客户转为被动型投资，曼氏集团 55 亿美元资金外流
item.description: Man Group Plc 报告称，第三季度资金外流 55 亿美元，这是至少四年来的最大跌幅，因为有客户撤回了资金，转而进行被动投资。【原文：Man Group Plc reported $5.5 billion in outflows during the third quarter, the biggest drop in at least four years after a client withdrew its funds to invest passively.】

item.title: 理学日本首次公开募股定价最高，融资 7.51 亿美元
item.description: X 射线技术公司理学控股公司（Rigaku Holdings Corp.）【原文：X-Ray technology company Rigaku Holdings Corp. has priced its Japan initial public offering at the top of the marketed range, with the deal raising ¥112.3 billion ($751 million).】

item.title: 中国电动卡车制造商风蔷科技进军欧洲，首次公开募股目标翻番
item.description: 中国电动卡车初创企业风蔷科技公司（Windrose Technology Inc.【原文：Chinese electric-truck startup Windrose Technology Inc. plans to expand in the heart of Europe, manufacturing vehicles in France and Belgium, where it is also considering a listing, according to founder Wen Han.】

item.title: 英德拉瓦蒂应邀参加印尼政策会议
item.description: 印尼当选总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）在周日就职典礼前连续举行会议，向他的未来部长人选解释政府的发展方向。【原文：Indonesia’s President-elect Prabowo Subianto is holding back-to-back meetings to explain the direction of his government with his prospective ministerial picks, ahead of his inauguration on Sunday.】

item.title: 瑞典 EQT 投资额达到 60 亿欧元，交易额强劲增长
item.description: 瑞典私募股权公司 EQT AB 在第三季度将投资额增加了两倍，资本市场活动的改善为强劲的交易流提供了支撑。【原文：Swedish private equity firm EQT AB tripled investments in the third quarter as strong levels of deal flow were underpinned by an improvement in capital markets activity.】

item.title: 默克集团削减医疗保健和生命科学目标，关注并购业务
item.description: 在一系列备受瞩目的药物试验受挫后，默克公司下调了其医疗保健部门的中期销售增长目标，并削减了其生命科学部门的最高指导目标。【原文：Merck KGaA cut its mid-term sales growth target for its health-care division after a number of high-profile drug trial setbacks and trimmed the top end of guidance for its life sciences unit.】

item.title: 高盛和 Amundi 看好英国债券，押注里夫斯避免特鲁斯时刻的到来
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Amundi SA are among those increasingly favoring UK bonds, an expression of confidence that the new government won’t jeopardize the country’s finances in its bid to spur the economy.】

在人工智能芯片热潮中，台积电的利润超出预期
item.description: 由于 Nvidia Corp. AI 芯片的强劲销售抵消了移动行业的下滑，台湾半导体制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.AI 芯片的强劲销售抵消了移动行业的下滑。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. posted a better-than-projected 54% rise in quarterly earnings after strong sales of Nvidia Corp. AI chips offset a sagging mobile industry.】

item.title: 中国和美国经济持续疲软，保乐力加销售额下降
item.description: 保乐力加集团（Pernod Ricard SA）称，第一季度销售额降幅超过预期，原因是其主要市场中国和美国的需求持续疲软，消费者不愿花钱购买价格昂贵的酒。【原文：Pernod Ricard SA said first quarter sales fell more than expected as weak demand in its top markets of China and the US persisted and consumers resisted shelling out on pricey booze.】

item.title: 尽管经济形势不明朗，阳狮集团仍提高了年度增长目标
item.description: 法国广告巨头阳狮集团（Publicis Groupe SA）上调了 2024 年的年度有机收入增长预期，同时警告称本季度经济形势严峻。【原文：French advertising giant Publicis Groupe SA raised its annual organic revenue growth guidance for 2024, even as it warned of challenging economic conditions in the current quarter.】

item.title: 诺基亚销售额低于预期，扭亏为盈未能实现
item.description: 诺基亚公司第三季度的销售额未能达到分析师的预期，因为经济复苏的速度比之前预期的要慢。【原文：Nokia Oyj sales failed to meet analysts’ estimates in the third quarter, as a recovery takes shape slower than previously expected.】

item.title: 经济学家称印尼宽松周期可能在 11 月重启
item.description: 据经济学家称，随着新政府上台，印尼央行最早可能将于下月恢复宽松周期，以促进东南亚最大经济体的经济增长。【原文：Bank Indonesia will likely resume its easing cycle as early as next month to deliver a growth boost to Southeast Asia’s largest economy as a new government takes the reins, according to economists.】

item.title: 比特币在市场中遥遥领先，显示对特朗普获胜的押注
item.description: 比特币的涨势之所以备受瞩目，部分原因是一些投资者认为比特币的攀升表明市场预计支持加密货币的共和党候选人唐纳德-特朗普将在美国总统大选中获胜。【原文：A Bitcoin rally is grabbing the spotlight in part because some investors view the climb as a sign that markets anticipate a victory for pro-crypto Republican candidate Donald Trump in the US presidential election.】

item.title: ABB上调利润率展望，电力部门从数据繁荣中获益
item.description: ABB 有限公司上调了利润率展望，原因是对数据中心的大规模投资刺激了对其电网业务的需求，帮助抵消了工厂自动化产品销售的疲软。【原文：ABB Ltd. raised its margin outlook as massive investments in data centers fueled demand for its power-grid business, helping offset weaker sales of factory automation products.】

item.title: 雀巢在任命新首席执行官数周后下调全年业绩预期
item.description: 雀巢公司（Nestle SA）下调了今年的销售额和利润指导，因为在价格上涨导致消费者不再购买品牌产品后，该公司正努力重建市场份额。【原文：Nestle SA cut its sales and profit guidance for the year as it struggles to rebuild market share after higher prices turned consumers off branded products.】

item.title: 扎布卡首次登陆股市为华沙首次公开募股的觉醒点燃希望
item.description: Zabka Group SA 首次公开发行 16 亿美元的股票，使人们更加乐观地认为，波兰四年来最大的首次股票出售将有助于引发上市复兴。【原文：Zabka Group SA’s $1.6 billion initial public offering has boosted optimism that Poland’s biggest first-time share sale in four years can help spark a listings revival.】

item.title: 华夏幸福提出削减 28 亿美元债务的非正统计划
item.description: 继今年早些时候成功以折扣价清偿约 100 亿元人民币（合 14 亿美元）借款后，华夏幸福基业股份有限公司（China Fortune Land Development Co.【原文：China Fortune Land Development Co. is again pitching an unorthodox debt-reduction plan, after achieving success earlier this year in clearing up some 10 billion yuan ($1.4 billion) of borrowings at a discount.】

item.title: 埃及通胀率意外攀升可能将降息推迟至 2025 年
item.description: 埃及看来要等到明年才会进行自 2020 年以来的首次降息，因为它正在努力应对通货膨胀的意外加快以及对中东地区更广泛冲突的担忧。【原文：Egypt looks set to wait until next year to make its first interest-rate cut since 2020 as it grapples with an unexpected quickening in inflation and fears of a wider conflict in the Middle East.】

item.title: FTX 的尼沙德-辛格敦促法官免除他的牢狱之灾
item.description: FTX 前工程主管请求法官不要因加密货币交易所倒闭而将他送进监狱。【原文：FTX’s former engineering chief asked a judge not to send him to prison for the collapse of the cryptocurrency exchange.】
